===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    auto ymwi{1/std::chrono::Wednesday[2]/2021};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; ymwi &lt;&lt; '\n';

    ymwi += std::chrono::years(5);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; ymwi &lt;&lt; '\n';
    assert(static_cast&lt;std::chrono::year_month_day&gt;(ymwi) ==
                       std::chrono::year(2026)/1/14);

    ymwi -= std::chrono::months(1);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; ymwi &lt;&lt; '\n';
    assert(static_cast&lt;std::chrono::year_month_day&gt;(ymwi) == 
                       std::chrono::day(10)/12/2025);
}
|output=
2021/Jan/Wed[2]
2026/Jan/Wed[2]
2025/Dec/Wed[2]
}}
